name: Death Ritual
description:
" and he threw him into the abyss, and shut it and sealed it over him, so that he would not deceive the nations any longer, until the thousand years were completed; after these things he must be released for a short time."

-- Revelation 20:3

Perform the Death Ritual.

Perform it funky.

As the glyphs appear, reveal their true meaning by pressing the true key.

Keys: O S A T A N

During the ritual, you may fail 6 times. Holding SPACE while performing the ritual will show your remaining chances.
